event.titlec: 「啓」系列2024﹕嶺南影像 - 港澳深穗電影交流展：《明媚時光》
event.titlee: !NSPIRESeries 2024: Lingnan Images - A Cinematic Crossover of 4 Cities: " GlamorousYouth "
event.agelimitc: 只准18歲或以上人士觀看
event.agelimite: For Persons Aged 18 or above Only
event.descc:
導演 / 編劇：翁子光 攝影：李植熹 監製：張雯 演員：太保、翁家軒、王璐瑤、李子涵、梁榮忠、許素瑩 2009 | 彩色 | 133’ | DCP 粵語及普通話對白，中英文字幕
2009 香港電影評論學會大獎推薦電影
通過兩個家庭的兩代人的倫理與愛情，突出青春苦悶和徒然的反抗。以香港和內地作為場景，作者以坦誠又激烈的態度，作出不滿現實又不滿於過去的自己的表白。
這是香港和深圳之間一年內發生的故事。父親常上深圳幹偏門行當，兒子陳健康上深圳是逃避香港苦悶的家庭和戀愛。陳的女友和媽媽也處於鬱抑的病態，他們都在尋找精神出路。陳從中學老師中得到啓發，可惜老師卻早逝。在深圳，陳找到同居對象但仍困於因循的生活。這些人物不是錯過就是不懂得珍惜青春，如今都期盼着明媚春光的再臨！
event.desce:
Director / Screenwriter: Philip Yung Cinematographer: Harry Lee Producer: Chang Wen Cast: Tai Bo, Nelson Yung, Louise Wong, Sherry Lee, Joey Leung, Hui So-ying 2009 | Colour | 133’ | DCP In Cantonese and Putonghua with Chinese and English subtitles
2009 Film of Merit, Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards
The film highlights the adolescent depression and rebellion (in vain) through the love and relationships between the two generations in two families. The author makes a confession that shows his dissatisfaction about the reality and his own past, with an honest and passionate approach.
This was a story took place in Hong Kong and Shenzhen within one year. The father often went to the latter for illegal dealings, while the son, Chan Kin-hong, also went there to escape from his family and lover. Both his girlfriend and mother were in a state of depression, seeking spiritual outlets. Chan got some inspiration about life from a schoolteacher who sadly passed away. Although he found a cohabitant in Shenzhen, he was still trapped in his routine life. All these characters had missed or had not treasured their youths. Now they were longing for the return of the ‘glamorous youth’!
event.remarkc: 粵語及普通話對白，中英文字幕
event.remarke: In Cantonese and Putonghua with Chinese and English subtitles

event.titlec: 「啓」系列2024﹕嶺南影像 - 港澳深穗電影交流展：《三元里》《差館II》
event.titlee: !NSPIRESeries 2024: Lingnan Images - A Cinematic Crossover of 4 Cities: "San Yuan Li""San Yuan Li"
event.descc:
同場放映《三元里》《差館II》
《三元里》 導演：歐寧、曹斐 攝影：歐寧、曹斐、緣影會 錄音：李如一 剪接：曹斐 2003 | 黑白 | 40’ | 數碼檔案 粵語及普通話對白，中英文字幕
《三元里》是電影作為話語權落入民間的標誌；是先鋒性通過非專業方式達成的個案；是城市生活參與者化身為觀察者與表達者的濫觴。從這部電影開始，「城中村」由概念演變成具體的銀幕形象。
緣影會是千禧年前後活躍於深圳、廣州的民間電影團體，由歐寧於1999年創辦。本片是他和曹斐應威尼斯雙年展委約的創作，由緣影會核心成員協作而成。從三元里這個城中村開始對廣州進行分析和解讀，以城市漫步者的姿態，探討歷史之債、現代化與嶺南宗法聚落文化的衝突與調和、都市村莊的奇異建築和人文景觀，最後拍成一篇沒有旁白的影像詩。
《差館II》 導演：周浩 攝影：袁哲、周浩 錄音：周浩 剪接：譚佳英 製片：沈顥 2011 | 彩色 | 70’ | 數碼檔案 普通話對白，中英文字幕
對公共場所或機構的關注，是新聞工作者出身的周浩作品中的重要母題（motif）。和「直接電影」的冷眼旁觀不同，周浩的鏡頭在冷靜之餘仍保持溫度，更透過鏡頭與被拍攝者交流。
2010年，周浩完成紀錄片《差館》，並在第二年的香港「華語紀錄片節」獲得短片組亞軍。2011年春節期間，他回到廣州火車站越秀區派出所拍攝《差館II》。這裡有300名警察，春運時火車站每天發送二十萬人次，乃當時中國最繁忙的火車站之一。進出派出所的民眾，是形形色色「有困難找警察」的人們，這也正是觀察中國社會的一個切入點。
設交流會 (粵語及普通話主講) 講者：周浩、邱禮濤
event.desce:
The screening will include 2 films San Yuan Li and Cop Shop ll
San Yuan Li Directors: Ou Ning, Cao Fei Cinematographers: Ou Ning, Cao Fei, members of U-theque Sound Recording: Li Ruyi Editor: Cao Fei 2003 | B&W | 40’ | Digital File In Cantonese and Putonghua with Chinese and English subtitles
San Yuan Li is a sign to show cinema, as a power of discourse, comes to ordinary folk: it is a pioneering project made in a non-professional way; it is the first opportunity for city life participants to become observants and speakers. Starting from this film, ‘urban village’ is no longer a concept, but a concrete image on the screen. .
Founded by Ou Ning in 1999, U-theque was a civic film group active in Shenzhen and Guangzhou around the millennium. He and Cao Fei were invited by the Venice Biennale to make this film as a commissioned work. The directors, assisted by U-theque core members, conduct a cross-sectional study on Guangzhou with San Yuan Li, an urban village, as the starting point. As roamers in the city, the authors explore the debt of history, the conflicts and reconciliations of modernisation and the settlement-based culture in Lingnan, as well as the strange architecture and cultural landscape of urban villages. Eventually, it becomes a visual poem without narration.
Cop Shop ll Director: Zhou Hao Cinematographers: Yuan Zhe, Zhou Hao Sound Recording: Zhou Hao Editor: Tan Jiaying Producer: Shen Hao 2011 | Colour | 70’ | Digital File In Putonghua with Chinese and English subtitles
A concern for public places or organisatons is always an important motif in the works of Zhou Hao, a former journalist. Unlike the sober observation approach of the Direct Cinema, Zhou’s camera remains sober yet warm. He also interacts with shooting targets through it.
In 2010, Zhou finished the documentary Cop Shop, which won the runner-up prize in the Shorts Group of Chinese Documentary Festival in Hong Kong next year. He returned to the police station at Yuexiu District of the Guangzhou Railway Station to shoot Cop Shop ll during the Chinese New Year in 2011. It was one of the busiest stations in China, with 200,000 people arrived or left the Station each day and 300 cops were on duty at that period. Those who went into the police station were people with various types of difficulties. This could be a good starting point to observe Chinese society.
Exchange Session in Cantonese and Putonghua Speakers: Zhou Hao, Herman Yau

event.titlec: 「啓」系列2024﹕嶺南影像 - 港澳深穗電影交流展：《點對點》
event.titlee: !NSPIRE Series 2024: Lingnan Images - A Cinematic Crossover of 4 Cities: " Dot 2 Dot "
event.descc:
導演 / 編劇：黃浩然 攝影：歐陽志遠、戴偉棠 監製：黃浩然、鄺珮詩、吳凱恩 演員：陳豪、蒙亭宜、林子聰、張雪芹、邵仲衡、邵音音 2014 | 彩色 | 89’ | DCP 粵語及普通話對白，中英文字幕
2014 香港電影評論學會大獎推薦電影
受到以點連點拼圖遊戲的啓發，內地女生和海歸男生各自在城市中尋尋覓覓，探索今日和舊日的香港。在互相猜測、暗通情愫之同時也和觀眾共享追尋的樂趣。
海外歸來的雪聰和內地來港的小雪服務於不同行業，公餘都愛逛街；男的是回憶兒時的舊街景，女的是認識陌生的城市。兩人都在各個地鐵站旁找到奇異的點陣，連出耐人尋味的圖案：銅鑼灣站是煤氣火舌，荔枝角站是大象……寒來暑往，他們逐步解謎，同時讓觀衆重遊香江舊地、認識當年事。兩人完成了點對點的聯想，終於在堅尼地城海旁夕陽中面對面相認了。
event.desce:
Director / Screenwriter: Amos WHY Cinematographers: Zachery Au Yeung, Angus Tai Producers: Amos WHY, Teresa Kwong, Heidi Ng Cast: Moses Chan, Meng Tingyi, Lam Tze-chung, Candy Cheung, David Siu, Susan Shaw 2014 | Colour | 89’ | DCP In Cantonese and Putonghua with Chinese and English subtitles
2014 Film of Merit, Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards
Inspired by a traditional game which outlining a figure by joining the dots, a Mainland Chinese lady and a returned overseas man were each searching the ‘dots’ in the city on his/her own. While guessing the identity of each other and sending out love messages, they also shared the fun of exploring the Hong Kong of today and yesterday with the audience.
Suet-chung, an overseas returnee, and Xiaoxue, a lady from the Mainland, both loved wandering the city. The former was reminiscing the old streets, whereas the latter was trying to know more about Hong Kong. Both of them found strange sketches with dots at various Mass Transit Railway stations. Intriguing figures, like a flame or an elephant, would appear by joining the dots. Through solving the puzzles, they guided the audience to revisit old landmarks and relive historical events. After completing the ‘dot-to-dot’ conjecture, Suet-chung and Xiaoxue eventually met at Kennedy Town Praya under the sunset.

event.titlec: 「啓」系列2024﹕嶺南影像 - 港澳深穗電影交流展：《太陽雨》
event.titlee: !NSPIRE Series 2024: Lingnan Images - A Cinematic Crossover of 4 Cities: " Sun and Rain"
event.descc:
導演：張澤鳴 編劇：劉西鴻、張澤鳴 攝影：姚力、龐鐳 演員：嚴曉頻、孫淳、伊欣欣、張玲、張艷麗 1987 | 彩色 | 90’ | 數碼檔案 普通話對白，中英文字幕
改編自深圳作家劉西鴻得獎小說《你不可改變我》，是張澤鳴城市電影的扛鼎之作。改革開放的前沿，人們在西方文化襲來時驚慌失措，既迎新又不知如何去舊，迷茫困惑。愛情故事只是表象，一時失落才是本質。本片延續導演對現代化議題的思考，超前地描繪人與人之間的疏離與愛，今日依然是關於深圳最重要的銀幕講述之一。
圖書館管理員劉亞曦與從事廣告設計的戀人劉亦東的關係陰晴不定。東忙於公務，對曦時有冷落，令她頗感孤寂。一日，東的前女友突然到圖書館向曦宣佈和東的餘情未了、要將東奪走，令曦大為不快。另一邊廂，曦的閨蜜孔令凱放棄讀大學的機會，決意成為時裝模特並搭上了東。各人在執着一己的生活態度之同時、感情關係亦不自覺地隨情境而變幻 。
設交流會 (粵語主講) 講者：張澤鳴、羅卡、馮宇
event.desce:
Director: Zhang Zeming Screenwriters: Liu Xihong, Zhang Zeming Cinematographers: Yao Li, Pang Lei Cast: Yan Xiaopin, Sun Chun, Yi Xinxin, Zhang Ling, Zhang Yanli 1987 | Colour | 90’ | Digital File In Putonghua with Chinese and English subtitles
Adapted from the award-winning novel You Can’t Change Me by Shenzhen writer Liu Xihong, Sun and Rain is Zhang Zeming’s best ‘city film’. Situated at the fore-front of the reform and opening-up, the characters in the film panicked when the Western culture invaded. They were embracing the new, but did not know how to remove the old. Under the package of a love story, the depiction of temporary loss is the essence of the film which continues Zhang’s examination on modernisation. Illustrating the alienation and love in human relationship in a way ahead of its time, it remains one the most important cinematic narrations about Shenzhen now.
Librarian Liu Yaxi and advertising designer Liu Yidong had a turbulent relationship. The former often felt lonely as her boyfriend was busy at work. One day, Yidong’s ex-girlfriend came to tell Yaxi that she wanted to win him back. Meanwhile, Kong Lingkai, Yaxi’s good friend, became a fashion model and had an affair with Yidong. While all characters were obsessed with their own life attitudes, their relationships also kept on evolving as circumstances changed.
Exchange Session in Cantonese Speakers: Zhang Zeming, Law Kar, Feng Yu

event.titlec: 「啓」系列2024﹕嶺南影像 - 港澳深穗電影交流展：《回南天》
event.titlee: !NSPIRE Series 2024: Lingnan Images - A Cinematic Crossover of 4 Cities: "Damp Season"
event.descc:
導演：高鳴 編劇：高鳴、劉兵 攝影：大塚龍治 監製：萬瑪才旦、耿軍 演員：黃宇聰、陳宣宇、梁龍、林子熙 2020 | 彩色 | 106’ | DCP 普通話及粵語對白，中英文字幕
2020 全州國際電影節國際競賽首獎
「回南天」本是嶺南春季常見的天氣，揮之不去的潮濕霉腐讓人生厭又無可奈何。身處深圳城中村的打工族，經濟與精神有形無形的壓力也是困擾著他們的另一種「回南天」。
「被包裹在水蒸汽裡的感受，你是說不出來的，但是極其痛苦。」《回南天》講述的，就是春來夏未至的深圳。青年男女小東和杜鵑貌合神離、又各自另生情愫。而生活在恆溫恆濕環境、長年不見天日的龍老師，也有着不能承受的輕。劇中每個人都渴望自由，渴望愛與被愛，但每個人又都是孤獨的，希望從別人身上找尋自己沒有的力量。
設交流會 (粵語及普通話主講) 講者：高鳴、翁子光
event.desce:
Director: Gao Ming Screenwriters: Gao Ming, Liu Bing Cinematographer: Ryuji Otsuka Executive Producers: Pema Tseden, Geng Jun Cast: Huang Yucong, Chen Xuanyu, Liang Long, Phoebe Lin 2020 | Colour | 106’ | DCP In Putonghua and Cantonese with Chinese and English subtitles
2020 Grand Prize, International Competition, Jeonju International Film Festival
The ‘damp’ feel is a common weather phenomenon during spring in southern China. The wet and mouldy environment makes people upset and helpless. For the working class living in the urban villages of Shenzhen, the economic and mental stresses that they have to face are another kind of ‘damp season’.
‘You can’t tell the feeling of being wrapped up by steam, but it’s pretty painful.’ Damp Season took place at Shenzhen during the time between spring and summer. Young couple Xiaodong and Dujuan were in an alienated relationship and each had his / her own affairs. Meanwhile, teacher Long, who lived in an environment with constant temperature and humidity but sunshine, suffered from a kind of unbearable lightness. Every character in the film longed for freedom, love and being loved. Yet they were all alone and hoped to find the strengths that they did not possess from other people.
Exchange Session in Cantonese and Putonghua Speakers: Gao Ming, Philip Yung

event.titlec: 「啓」系列2024﹕嶺南影像 - 港澳深穗電影交流展：《葉問 ─ 終極一戰》
event.titlee: !NSPIRE Series 2024: Lingnan Images - A Cinematic Crossover of 4 Cities: "Ip Man - The Final Fight"
event.descc:
導演：邱禮濤 編劇：李敏 攝影：陳廣鴻 監製：冼國林、利雅博 演員：黃秋生、鍾欣桐、陳小春、曾志偉、周定宇 2013 | 彩色 | 101’ | DCP 粵語對白，中英文字幕
2013 香港電影評論學會大獎推薦電影 2013 澳門國際電影節金蓮花最佳男主角及最佳女配角
以扎實的手法還原葉問的真像。描繪中晚年的葉問流落香江，在人生崎嶇路上飽經顛簸，卻深懂人情世故，更勇於為人排難解紛，切實寫出他成為一派宗師那不辭勞苦的過程。
踏入中年又有胃病的葉問由內地來港謀生，在港九飯店職工總會天台教授詠春拳，一群新收徒眾中有活躍的工會份子，也有當差的而後來鎮壓工人罷工與友人成為對立。為師傅的要求徒弟本着良心做人，加以排解。但晚年遇上個風塵女人成了紅顏知己，卻不被徒弟諒解。葉問能化敵為友但也出於義憤、挺身和九龍城寨的惡霸決戰。影片把葉問由神還原為人的同時，又展示了嶺南武術文化的美德，重現了五六十年代的香江風貌。
event.desce:
Director: Herman Yau Screenwriter: Erica Li Cinematographer: Joe Chan Producers: Checkley Sin, Albert Lee Cast: Anthony Wong, Gillian Chung, Jordan Chan, Eric Tsang, Marvel Chow 2013 | Colour | 101’ | DCP In Cantonese with Chinese and English subtitles
2013 Film of Merit, Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards 2013 Best Leading Actor and Best Supporting Actress, The Golden-Lotus Awards, Macau International Movie Festival
The film uses a plain and simple approach to restore the true image of kung fu master Ip Man. Fleeing to Hong Kong after having a lot of setbacks in life, Ip became a man of the world and was willing to solve problems for others. The film depicts in detail the difficult journey that leads him to finally be regarded as a true master.
Ip, middle-aged and suffered from stomach trouble, came from the Mainland to earn a living in Hong Kong by teaching Wing Tsun at the premises of a labour union. Among his students, there were active unionists, as well as policemen who suppressed labour strikes. Trying to resolve their conflicts, Ip asked them to act according to their conscience. But the students did not understand him when he got acquainted with a sex worker in his later years. Although he sometimes would make friends with his enemies, he was not afraid to have a duel with a thug for justice. Besides restoring Ip as a true human being with flesh and blood, the film also showcases the moral of Lingnan martial arts and the cityscape of Hong Kong from 1950s to 1960s.

event.remarke: In Cantonese with Chinese and English subtitles

event.titlec: 「啓」系列2024﹕嶺南影像 - 港澳深穗電影交流展：《堂口故事2：愛情在城》
event.titlee: !NSPIRE Series 2024: Lingnan Images - A Cinematic Crossover of 4 Cities: "Macau Stories 2: Love in the City"
event.descc:
導演：鄭君熾、義來、歐陽永鋒、杜健康、黎若嵐、黃婷婷 編劇：鄭君熾、Edgar Medina、歐陽永鋒、Javis Lee、杜健康、梁怡安、黎若嵐、黃婷婷 攝影：陳楚強、葉紹麒、張穎 監製：朱佑人、鄧漢強 演員：張栢菱、梁子麟、葉崇茵、黃思傑、小肥、朱蕾安、蔡贇、丁倩玉、何汝霆、Daniela Guerreiro、梁梓豪、陳詩慧、Soler 2011 | 彩色 Colour | 103’ | DCP 粵語及普通話對白，中英文字幕
2012 葡萄牙阿旺卡國際電影節國際長片特別表揚
講起澳門電影，朱佑人舉足輕重。1999年，他成立拍板視覺藝術團，聚集一班電影愛好者分享和製作電影。他監製的《堂口故事》系列，挖掘並團結起一班修讀電影的澳門年輕人，開拍屬於澳門自己的電影。
2008年起，澳門電影工作者發起《堂口故事》電影保育運動。三年後，第二部曲以愛為名， 六位澳門本地新導演異軍群起，與廖慶松、清水宏一、關本良和葉紹麒等國際級影人穿梭於澳門街頭，記錄這個城市的人和事，拍下六個關於愛情的故事。
《百年孤寂》：圖書館裡一本塵封的小説，原來藏着一顆靜候她的戀愛種子；《June》：女裁縫遇上找尋過去的年輕人，在深藍月映下，她偷偷聽着自己的心跳；《SaFa》：她對這張舊沙發一見鍾情，而他看到的，卻是一雙熱烈而豐滿的紅唇；《蛋糕》：某夜，保安員吃到神秘的蛋糕，於是下定決心要在生活中找尋甜美的來源；《觸電》：開始戀愛，總懷疑眼前人是天外來客，令人心動卻又難以觸摸；《冰凍的世界》：初戀令人不怕死，敢用自己相信的方式，奮不顧身地投入這個世界……
設映後談 (粵語主講) 講者：朱佑人，黃婷婷
event.desce:
Directors: Jordan Cheng, Fernando Eloy, Mike Ao Ieong, Tou Kin-hong, Elisabela Larrea, Wong Teng-teng Screenwriters: Jordan Cheng, Edgar Medina, Mike Ao Ieong, Javis Lee, Tou Kin-hong, Ian Leung, Elisabela Larrea, Wong Teng-teng Cinematographers: Chan Chor-keung, Yip Siuki, Zhang Ying Producers: Albert Chu, Mathew Tang Cast: Cheong Pak-leng, Leong Chi-lon, Anna Yip, Lawrence Wong, Terence Tsui, Julianne, Cai Yun, Dinh Thi Ngoc, Trevor Ho, Daniela Guerreiro, Leung Tsz-ho, Chan Sze-wai, Soler 2011 | Colour | 103’ | DCP In Cantonese and Putonghua with Chinese and English subtitles
2012 Special Mention, AVANCA International Film Festival, Portugal
Albert Chu Iao Ian plays an important role in Macao cinema. He founded Associação Audio-Visual CUT in 1999 to share and produce films with fellow film lovers. Several young local talents who studied film have been spotted by Chu and teamed up to make films about Macao in the Macau Stories Series, produced by him.
Some Macao filmmakers launched the Macau Stories campaign in 2008 for local cinema preservation. Three years later, local new talents, including Jordan Cheng, Fernando Eloy, Mike Ao Ieong, Tou Kin-hong, Elisabela Larrea and Wong Teng-teng, emerged on the scene through the second part of the campaign, under the theme of ‘love’. To record the people and tales of the city, they collaborated with world-class filmmakers like Liao Ching-sung, Koichi Shimizu, Kwan Pun Leung and Yip Shiu Kei on the streets of Macao and created six stories about love.
A Book to Remember: a book that had been gathering dust in a library hid a love seed, awaiting her; June: a female tailor was listening to her own heartbeat when she met a young man who was searching for the past under the blue moon; Safa: she fell in love with the old sofa at the first sight, while what he saw was a pair of hot and fat lips; Cake: a security guard had a piece of mysterious cake and then began to search for the source of sweetness in life; Shocking: when you fell in love, you always suspected that your lover was a seductive and untouchable alien; Frozen World: first love made lovers brave, even risking their own lives to participate in this world…
Post-screening talk in Cantonese Speakers: Albert Chu, Wong Teng-teng
event.remarkc: 粵語及普通話對白，中英文字幕

event.titlec: 「啓」系列2024﹕嶺南影像 - 港澳深穗電影交流展：《過雲雨》
event.titlee: !NSPIRE Series 2024: Lingnan Images - A Cinematic Crossover of 4 Cities: "Passing Rain"
event.descc:
導演 / 監製 / 編劇：陳嘉強 攝影：孟曉清 演員：陳建德、曾韋迪、王萍、林蔚、李耀愷、李德 2017 | 彩色 | 92’ | DCP 粵語及普通話對白，中英文字幕
陳嘉強執導的首作已顯見其敘事亂中有序和處理時空的能力，使得多線交錯、多面發展的故事說來趣味盎然，儼然是映照今日澳門的一面小鏡子。
環繞六個人物發生於今日澳門的小故事：陪姊妹來澳玩順便賺快錢卻總是遇人不淑的「北姑」，欠下賭債瀕臨險境的富家司機，瞞着太太到外面「偷食」的懦弱男人，暗戀教琴老師的妙齡少女，為跟縱所愛行動匪夷所思的「小丑」，想像自己飛上月球的天真小孩。多條線索交織敍事不依常規卻也可感能解。一如片名所示，世事如浮雲驟雨。影片製作嚴謹但格調輕鬆，看後只留下一抹微笑、一聲嘆喟。
設交流會 (粵語主講) 講者：陳嘉強
event.desce:
Director / Producer / Screenwriter: Chan Ka-keong Cinematographer: Meng Xiaoqing Cast: Doug Chan, Dicky Tsang, Wang Ping, Candice Lam, Kayden Lei, Li De 2017 | Colour | 92’| DCP In Cantonese and Putonghua with Chinese and English subtitles
Chan Ka-keong already showcased his abilities to create an order in a chaotic narrative and to handle the time element in his directorial debut. The story, with intertwining plotlines and several development directions, is told in an interesting way and can serve as a mirror of today’s Macao. The film tells the stories of six characters in Macao today: a sex worker who travelled to the city and wanted to make some easy money, but always got cheated; a chauffeur of a rich family who was in dire straits because of a huge debt; a coward man who betrayed his wife; a young girl who had a crush on her piano teacher; a ‘clown’ who followed his lover with strange actions; and a naïve child who imagined himself flying to the moon. The plotlines are intertwined and narrated in an unconventional yet comprehensible way. As the title suggests, things change like passing rain. Meticulously produced, the film keeps a pleasant tone and lets the audience leave a smile and a sigh after watching.
Post-screening Talk in Cantonese Speaker: Chan Ka-keong
event.remarkc: 粵語及普通話對白，中英文字幕
event.remarke: In Cantonese and Putonghua with Chinese and English subtitles

event.titlec: 「啓」系列2024﹕嶺南影像 - 港澳深穗電影交流展：《呼吸正常》
event.titlee: !NSPIRE Series 2024: Lingnan Images - A Cinematic Crossover of 4 Cities: "Something in Blue"
event.descc:
導演：李雲波 編劇：李雲波、花城紀創作組 攝影：雲中、辛理、張俊輝 監製：羅韵源、曾怡清、李雲波 演員：張興超、葉鋭洪、周嘉亨、李會 2016 | 彩色 | 106’| DCP 普通話及粵語對白，中英文字幕
這是一部關於廣州的電影，但此時此地跟《八卦》裡的城中村已是另一世界，連粵語口音都「今時唔同往日」。社會已經發展、秩序塵埃落定，年輕人要在座次排定的世界謀得一席之地，要努力，也要「拚爹」。
「四個青年，四季輪轉，一座城市，愛情與理想，輕鬆的茫然。」這部半即興、半紀實的低成本製作，輕故事、重感覺。看似業餘，卻別具真實感。「行行企企沒事發生，口花花好似冇乜主題」，卻又帶出時下廣州青年的種種日常。輕描淡寫四個青年人在城市中流浪、找工作、追女仔都不見成績，但過程有趣亦有啓發性，簡直是赤裸裸的城市遊記。
設交流會 (粵語及普通話主講) 講者：李雲波、黃浩然
event.desce:
Director: Li Yunbo Screenwriters: Li Yunbo, SIB Group Cinematographers: Yun Zhong, Xin Li, Zhang Junhui Executive Producers: Luo Yunyuan, Zeng Yiqing, Li Yunbo Cast: Zhang Xingchao, Ye Ruihong, Zhou Jiaheng, Li Hui 2016 | Colour | 106’ | DCP In Putonghua and Cantonese with Chinese and English subtitles
Something in Blue is another film about Guangzhou, but the time and location it takes place, even the Cantonese accent, are quite different from the urban village in Eight Diagrams. Since the society had developed and the order had established, youths needed to work hard and ‘have a successful dad’ to fight for a place in a world that all seats were taken.
‘Four youths. The cycle of four seasons. One city. Love and ideals. At a loss with a relaxed feeling.’ A half-improvisational and half-documentative low-budget production, the film puts emphasis on the feel, rather than the story. It may look amateurish, but does possess a sense of realism. Although the characters failed to get jobs or date girls, the processes were interesting and inspirational. Through showing them wandering around with nothing really happened and keeping on talking nonsense without a theme, the film may serve as a travelogue in the city by reflecting the daily lives of Guangzhou youths today.
Exchange Session in Cantonese and Putonghua Speakers: Li Yunbo, Amos WHY

event.titlec: 「啓」系列2024﹕嶺南影像 - 港澳深穗電影交流展：座談放映1：知識分子電影的精神
event.titlee: !NSPIRE Series 2024: Lingnan Images - A Cinematic Crossover of 4 Cities: Seminar Screening 1: The Spirit of Films about Intellectuals
event.descc:
講者：甘小二 嘉賓：劉嶔 普通話及粵語主講
影片片段選映 《坪石先生》（2024）
華語電影中的知識分子電影屈指可數，《坪石先生》可能是最新的一部。2024 年是中山大學建校100 周年，2025年是抗戰勝利80 周年，本片由今天的大學教授拍攝80年前的大學教授，帶觀眾回到「篳路藍縷氣猶在，殘山剩水血未涼」的抗戰年代，攜着強烈的來自知識分子的精神力量。導演志在研習當年大師風度，亦圖關照當今教育。今次榮幸邀得甘導演來港以最新作示範，並和香港學者劉嶔座談他的電影精神。
event.desce:
Speaker: Gan Xiao’er Guest: Lau Yam In Putonghua and Cantonese
Screening film excerpt Scholars Under Fire （2024）
There are few Chinese language films talking about intellectuals, Scholars Under Fire probably being the latest one. 2024 marks the 100th anniversary of Sun Yat-sen University, while we shall celebrate the 80th anniversary of the victory of the War of Resistance against Japanese Aggression in 2025. The film, made by a professor of today, tells the story of one of his counterparts 80 years ago. Showcasing the strong spiritual power of intellectuals, it brings the audience back to the War days, when people were in high spirits despite the difficulties. The director shows his care for the current education situation while studying the glamour of a master of yesteryear.
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 「啓」系列2024﹕嶺南影像 - 港澳深穗電影交流展：座談放映 2：隱秘的嶺南心事
event.titlee: !NSPIRE Series 2024: Lingnan Images - A Cinematic Crossover of 4 Cities: Seminar Screening 2: Lingnan's Secret Thoughts in Minds
event.descc:
講者：楊平道 嘉賓：陸叔遠 粵語主講
影片片段選映 《鵝凰嶂逸事》（2013） 《好友》（2018） 《裂流》（2020） 《浪漫的斷章》（2023） 《急火攻心》（製作中）
楊平道的話 嶺南天氣濕熱，人的邊界感比北方更顯。心事焦灼卻欲言又止，話說三分。嶺南電影或者抒情，也不好讓人物直言，但風雨可以說，沉默的山可以說——我選景時有通感，不是進入了雨霧繚繞的山谷，而是已經進入人物的內心，透過感受風雨雲、蟲叫蛙鳴去體察人的悲歡離合。電影只拍「三分」更動人，是因為承認了靈魂的困境。孤獨是一個靈魂很難靠近另一個靈魂，徒留更多心事。只拍「三分」的電影，收穫了更廣闊的世界。
event.desce:
Speaker: Yang Pingdao Guest: Robert Loh In Cantonese
Screening film excerpts E Huang Mountain （2013） My Dear Friend （2018） A Yang Pingdao Film （2020） A Romantic Fragment （2023） Work in Progress (WIP)
Message from Yang Pingdao Lingnan has a humid and hot climate, so the people there have a higher sense of personal boundaries than northerners. They hold back their words even though they are anxious. But the weather and silent mountains in Lingnan films can express the characters’ thoughts instead. When I choose shooting locations, I have a sense to experience the sorrows and joys of human beings through the nature. Films become more moving if they only show 30% of what can be expressed, because they admit the dilemma of the soul. Such films embrace a wider world.
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 「啓」系列2024﹕嶺南影像 - 港澳深穗電影交流展：座談放映 3：澳門電影的發展狀況
event.titlee: !NSPIRE Series 2024: Lingnan Images - A Cinematic Crossover of 4 Cities: Seminar Screening 3: The Current Situation of Macao Cinema
event.descc:
講者: 朱佑人、黃婷婷 粵語主講
影片片段選映 《堂口故事》系列 《撞牆》（2016） 《梅婆》（2021） 《幸運閣》（2024） 等
澳門電影事業是回歸後在政府的扶持下才發展起來。朱佑人監製的《堂口故事》系列是先行之作；今次邀得他和持續參與系列片製作的導演黃婷婷以親身經歷和長期觀察講述澳門電影發展上的問題和展望，並以黃婷婷新作《幸運閣》和其他片段示範。
《幸》片得到澳門文化局和中國青年電影扶持計劃的資助，經數年籌備拍製，講的是藝術和倫理交纒的故事。參演者皆澳門影劇藝術界的新銳，並得香港女將顏卓靈和翁靜晶助陣。
event.desce:
Speakers: Albert Chu, Wong Teng-teng In Cantonese
Screening film excerpts Macau Stories Series Crash （2016） Mui （2021） Revisit （2024） etc.
With the support of the government, the Macao film industry began to develop after the city’s return to the motherland. The Macau Stories Series, produced by Albert Chu, are pioneering works. He and director Wong Tengteng, who keeps on participating in the production of the series, are invited to share their opinions on the prospect and issues of Macao cinema with their first-hand experiences and long-term observations. Wong’s latest work, Revisit , and excerpts of some other films will be shown as examples.
With the sponsorships from Macao Cultural Affairs Bureau and CFDG Young Director Support Programme, it takes some years for Revisit to finish. The cast of this intertwining story about arts and relationships include many new cinema and drama talents of Macao, together with Hong Kong actresses Cherry Ngan and Mary Jean Reimer.
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 「啓」系列2024﹕嶺南影像 - 港澳深穗電影交流展：短片集 I
event.titlee: !NSPIRE Series 2024: Lingnan Images - A Cinematic Crossover of 4 Cities: Shorts I
event.descc:
《九龍東往事》 導演 / 編劇 / 剪接：王博 攝影：Yavuz Selim Isler 錄音：Franco van der Lidne 監製：姚若瑤 2023 | 彩色 | 38’ | 數碼檔案 粵語、英語及普通話對白，中英文字幕
2023 丹麥哥本哈根國際紀錄片影展新視野獎 2023 德國萊比錫紀錄片與動畫影展金鴿獎
通過獻出頭髮的鬼魂的敍述，引領我們重溫香港作為東南亞假髮生產中心的往事。研究視覺藝術的王博以精妙的音與畫敍說二十世紀以來頭髮與抗日、冷戰的關係史，以及和香港的關連。
《澳．土》 導演 / 編劇 / 剪接：黎若嵐 攝影：馮永浩 2007 | 彩色 | 38’ | 數碼檔案 粵語、英語、葡萄牙語及澳門土生土語對白，中英文字幕
葡國人在澳門生養的後代一般稱做土生葡人（Macanese）。回歸之後土生葡人成了「少數族裔」；保留着自己的生活方式、語言，和主流社會若即若離。本身是土生的黎若嵐為此作了精簡到家的訪談拍攝，剪輯成嚴肅又輕快的本片。
event.desce:
“An Asian Ghost Story” Director / Screenwriter / Editor: Wang Bo Cinematographer: Yavuz Selim Isler Sound Recording: Franco van der Lidne Producer: Ruoyao Jane Yao 2023 | Colour | 38’ | Digital File In Cantonese, English and Putonghua with Chinese and English subtitles
2023 New:Vision Award, CPH:DOX, Denmark 2023 Golden Dove Award, DOK Leipzig, Germany
Following the narration of a ghost who donated her hair, we can revisit the glorious days of Hong Kong – as the production centre of wigs in Southeast Asia. Wang Bo, who researches visual art, tells the hair’s relations with the War of Resistance against Japanese Aggression, the Cold War and Hong Kong since the 20th Century through exquisite sound and visual.
“Sons of the Land” Director / Screenwriter / Editor: Elisabela Larrea Cinematographer: Fong Weng-hou 2007 | Colour | 38’ | Digital File In Cantonese, English, Portuguese and Patuá with Chinese and English subtitles
The generations born and raised in Macao by Portuguese people are called Macanese. Although becoming an ‘ethnic minority’ after Macao’s return to the motherland, they still maintain their own lifestyle and language, as well as keeping a somewhat detached attitude towards the mainstream society. Elisabela Larrea, a Macanese herself, did some concise interviews and shootings on this topic and made a serious yet light-hearted film.
“Fonting the City” Director / Editor: Wallace Chan Chi-ieong Producer / Cinematographer: Marble Leong Ka-kun 2015 | Colour | 40’ | Digital File In Cantonese with Chinese and English subtitles
There are still many stunning Chinese handwritings on the signboards, walls and pillars of some Macao old shops. Designer Wallace Chan pays a huge effort in collecting and shooting these Chinese characters remained on product packages and streets with his friends. He also traces their cultural origins to create a film that interprets Chinese characters and the city landscape.
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 「啓」系列2024﹕嶺南影像 - 港澳深穗電影交流展：短片集 I

2023 New:Vision Award, CPH:DOX, Denmark 2023 Golden Dove Award, DOK Leipzig, Germany

Although becoming an ‘ethnic minority’ after Macao’s return to the motherland, they still maintain their own lifestyle and language, as well as keeping a somewhat detached attitude towards the mainstream society. Elisabela Larrea, a Macanese herself, did some concise interviews and shootings on this topic and made a serious yet light-hearted film.
“Fonting the City” Director / Editor: Wallace Chan Chi-ieong Producer / Cinematographer: Marble Leong Ka-kun 2015 | Colour | 40’ | Digital File In Cantonese with Chinese and English subtitles
There are still many stunning Chinese handwritings on the signboards, walls and pillars of some Macao old shops. Designer Wallace Chan pays a huge effort in collecting and shooting these Chinese characters remained on product packages and streets with his friends. He also traces their cultural origins to create a film that interprets Chinese characters and the city landscape.
Exchange Session in Cantonese Speaker: Wallace Chan, Elisabela Larrea │ Host: Law Kar
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 「啓」系列2024﹕嶺南影像 - 港澳深穗電影交流展：短片集 II
event.titlee: !NSPIRE Series 2024: Lingnan Images - A Cinematic Crossover of 4 Cities: Shorts II
event.descc:
《瘴氣，植物，外銷畫》 導演 / 文字：王博、潘律 攝影 / 剪接：王博 錄音：羅威 製片：龍淼淵 2017 | 彩色 | 28’ | 數碼檔案 普通話及英語對白，中英文字幕
2018 日本影像論壇電影節「東亞實驗電影」競賽單元優秀獎
十九世紀流行的瘴氣理論將瘟疫和空氣、環境與種族聯繫起來。香港植物園的建立肩負着為英國整理本地植物和自然知識的任務，卻間接促進了外銷畫在歐洲的流行。本片着眼於梳理早期殖民主義和帝國擴張對粵港空間與自然形態的影響，也試圖探討在這一框架下東西方文化或商貿交流的模式。
《歷歷如畫》 導演：陳東楠 攝影：蕭瀟 剪接：楊瀟、陳思思 錄音：彭鏑 監製：吳玉堅、吳宇航 2023 | 彩色 | 24’ | 數碼檔案 普通話及方言對白，中英文字幕
在深圳大芬油畫村由「複製」邁向「原創」之際，影片對其十四幅畫作進行了一場田野調查，探索藝術，商品和社會現實之間層層纏繞的交互作用。鏡頭重新凝視這些最常見卻又最被忽略的畫，為這些無法踏入美術館的作品構建一場展覽。
《恐懼與顫慄》 導演 / 編劇：甘小二 攝影：王國維 演員：劉睿靈 、張世婷 2009 | 彩色 | 35’ | 數碼檔案 無對白
一個頭上長着羊角的小男孩，召集了一群Coser，每人一件傳統的木工工具，從小賣部、破舊的天主堂、城門樓、森林、農家院落、電動麻雀館、古堡等處，兵分四路，集合在一起。經過笨拙的勞動，他們造出一個巨大的十字架。
《手機鄰居》 導演 / 攝影：黃偉凱 編劇：黃偉凱、王碸 監製：黎究楚、彭嵐、黃偉凱 演員：王煦童 、黃偉凱 2024 | 彩色 | 15’ | 數碼檔案 普通話及粵語對白，中英文字幕
疫情期間，正處在生活旋渦裡的中年導演，突然接到一個揚言要自殺的陌生電話……
設交流會 (粵語主講) 講者：陳子揚、黎若嵐 ｜ 主持：羅卡
event.desce:
“Miasma, Plants, Export Paintings” Director / Screenwriter: Wang Bo, Pan Lu Cinematographer / Editor: Wang Bo Sound Recording: Luo Wei Producer: Andrew Lone 2017 | Colour | 28’ | Digital File In Putonghua and English with Chinese and English subtitles
2018 Award for Excellence, East Asian Experimental Competition, Image Forum Film Festival, Japan
The miasma theory, popular in the 19th Century, links plagues with air, environment and ethnicity. Hong Kong Botanical Garden was founded with the task to collate the knowledge about local botany and nature for the UK, but it indirectly promoted the popularity of export paintings in Europe. The film tries to explore the exchange patterns of culture and trade between the east and the west under this framework.
“14 Paintings” Director: Chen Dongnan Cinematographer: Xiao Xiao Editors: Yang Xiao, Chen Sisi Sound Recording: Pandy Peng Producers: Wu Yujian, Wu Yuhang 2023 | Colour | 24’ | Digital File In Putonghua and dialects with Chinese and English subtitles
While the products of Dafen Oil Painting Village are changing from copycats to originals, the film conducts a field study to explore the interrelationship among arts, commodities and social reality. The camera stares at those most common yet most easily ignored paintings to curate an exhibition for these works that cannot enter museums.
“Fear and Trembling” Director / Screenwriter: Gan Xiao’er Cinematographer: Wang Guowei Cast: Liu Ruiling, Zhang Shiting 2009 | Colour | 28’ | Digital File No dialogue
A little boy with goat horns on his head assembled a group of cosers, each carrying a carpenter’s tool. They gathered together after walking past a tuck shop, an old catholic chapel, the city gate tower, the forest, some cottages, an electronic mahjong game centre and a castle. Then they made a huge cross with some clumsy labour work.
“Real Talk” Director / Cinematographer: Huang Weikai Screenwriters: Huang Weikai, Wang Feng Producers: Li Jiuchu, Peng Lan, Huang Weikai Cast: Wang Xutong, Huang Weikai 2024 | Colour | 15’ | Digital File In Putonghua and Cantonese with Chinese and English subtitles
During the pandemic, a middle-aged director in turmoil received a call from a stranger who claimed to commit suicide…
Exchange Session in Putonghua Speaker: Chen Dongnan, Huang Weikai, Pan Lu │ Host: Feng Yu
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 普 劇場 合家歡音樂劇《AI聖誕搞搞震》 - 屯門大會堂場地伙伴計劃
event.titlee: "Gaau Gaau Zan AI X'mas Musical" by Pop Theatre - Tuen Mun Town Hall Venue Partnership Scheme
event.descc: 未來世界，三個住在獨立cubical房間的三兄妹，早上被電腦叫醒，就馬登入電腦；生活在虛擬世界的人類已經不知道什麼是聖誕節！一天突然燈光閃動，有一神通廣大的黑客，自稱為聖誕公公，入侵弟弟的電腦。告訴他以前的聖誕節，不是跟他們現在的過節方法。他甚至在傳送柜中為弟弟送來一枝真的聖誕樹樹枝。弟弟從樹枝上聞到從來沒聞過的清新香氣。 三兄妹開始好奇並想尋找真正的聖誕節：小馬糟，是慶祝一個嬰兒的誕生，並為世界帶來信、望、和愛。聖誕節帶給全世界的喜悅、和平、寧靜及愛！
event.remarkc: 普 劇場為屯門大會堂場地伙伴
event.remarke: POP Theatre is a Venue Partner of the Tuen Mun Town Hall
event.presenterorgc: 普 劇場主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by POP Theatre

event.titlec: 一路青空《我阿媽係海盜王？！》— 沙田大會堂場地伙伴計劃
event.titlee: "Pirate Mamia" by The Radiant Theatre - Sha Tin Town Hall Venue Partnership Scheme
event.descc: 一個盡心盡力照顧屋企嘅媽媽🧒🏻，一個踏入青春期嘅家姐👩🏻，一個成日粒聲唔出嘅細佬👦🏻，一個負責搞笑嘅公公👨🏻‍🦳，再加上一隻食飽就瞓、瞓飽就食嘅老鼠🐭…竟然因為一張平時用嚟墊枱嘅「藏寶圖」，阿媽話要出海做「海盜」🏴‍☠️？！當呢隻海盜船遇上大風浪🌊，到底呢家人會唔會暈船浪？而寶藏又係邊度呢？🫣
event.desce: Please refer to the Chinese version.
event.remarkc: 三角關係及一路青空為沙田大會堂場地伙伴。
event.remarke: Trinity Theatre and The Radiant Theatre are the Venue Partners of the Sha Tin Town Hall.
event.presenterorgc: 一路青空主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by The Radiant Theatre

event.titlec: 《紅蕊梅豔粵韻花之粵劇折子戲（13）》
event.presenterorgc: 碧君粵藝苑主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Pik Kwan Chinese Opera Institute

event.titlec: 香港戲劇工程《愛的教育第二部曲 — 童心的冬日百頌》— 北區大會堂場地伙伴計劃
event.titlee: "The Heart's Winter Melody" by Hong Kong Theatre Works - North District Town Hall Venue Partnership Scheme
event.descc: 經典名著《愛的教育》，一位小學生一學年的日記，加上老師每月講的故事，百多年來，持續泛起溫柔的愛，影響後世深遠。 繼去年演出《萬里心程找媽媽》，今個聖誕，故事探險隊會再次帶領觀眾走進《愛的教育》這本書中的世界。今次以書中小學生安利柯的視點，呈現十九世紀末的意大利。四位同學，生於不同階級背景，但建立了珍貴的友誼。當中到底經歷過什麼事呢？ 新舊交替，但溫柔的關懷、同理心、自尊心、友誼、正確對待自己與他人的關係、同學、家人、師長、國家，在在與生活在當代的香港有關。 生命動人，因為有關懐，更因為有承擔。
event.remarkc: 香港戲劇工程為北區大會堂場地伙伴
event.remarke: Hong Kong Theatre Works is the Venue Partner of the North District Town Hall
event.presenterorgc: 香港戲劇工程主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Hong Kong Theatre Works

event.titlee: "Vivacious Dance Fairy" by Hong Kong Dance Company - Sha Tin Town Hall Venue Partnership Scheme
event.descc: 近150位學員身穿絢麗的民族舞衣，歡快地起舞，展現出輕盈如風的優雅。學員透過舞蹈自信地展現學習成果，與大家一同分享舞動的歡樂與喜悅！
event.desce: Nearly 150 dancers took the stage in a joyful celebration, gracefully showing their elegance while proudly sharing their accomplishments with everyone.

event.agelimitc: 適合12歲或以上人士觀看
event.agelimite: Audience of aged 12 or above are welcomed
event.descc:
音符拷問靈魂 一趟拆解重組孤寂的旅程
身處現今超連結的世界中，人們往往渴望親密與聯繫，試圖在藝術、音樂和文學中尋求慰藉。然而，我們所表達的即使多麼坦露，卻永遠有所隱藏。這種從孤獨中流露自我表達的欲望，在蕭邦筆下化成一首又一首夜曲。婉柔深沉的旋律最初於別廳奏起，在如此讓人沉思和放鬆的空間，樂曲就似區分了主觀經驗與客觀現實。我們在社交媒體的自我抒發，何嘗不是在演奏一首首夜曲，渴望尋找聆聽者？然而，問題依舊如故：我們如何才能真正被理解？我們所扮演的角色有多大程度上掩蓋了真我？
趙朗天與吳子昆創作的視聽演出《獨奏曲》試圖開闢一個空間，讓藝術家與觀眾一同經驗種種難以言喻的情感。在這趟往內探索的旅程，我們會發現，真正把人心連繫起來的東西其實溢於言表，藏於內在世界的呼應與共鳴，既幽微私密，同時卻渴望主體間相互理解。而《獨奏曲》正是在追尋群體連結中保留自我流動時，徘徊於孤獨和獨處之間的一瞬。
event.desce:
A vast exercise of shared solitude
In today's hyper-connected world, we seek solace in art, music, and literature that soothe our yearnings for intimacy and connections, yet our expressions often mask as much as they reveal. Chopin composed numerous nocturnes to capture our yearning for self-expression amidst isolation. They were first performed in withdrawal rooms, intimate spaces designed for contemplation and relaxation. Within this refined space, the compositions illuminated the beauty of inwardness that distinguishes subjective experience from objective reality. Similar to nocturnes, our social media expressions crave an audience, yet the question remains: how well are we truly understood? To what extent do our personas obscure the self?
with/drawing rooms, an audiovisual performance by Alain Chiu and Ng Tsz-Kwan, is a journey through indescribable feelings that the artist and audience share. It reveals that what truly unites us transcends linguistic expressions, lying in the mutual acknowledgement of inner worlds that remain, inexplicably, private yet yearning for intersubjective understanding. with/drawing rooms becomes an exercise in inhabiting the fluidity of selfhood amidst a desire for community, the transitory space in between loneliness and solitude.

event.titlec: 東九文化中心場地伙伴計劃 — 再構造劇場《吃掉城市的森林》讀劇演出
event.titlee: East Kowloon Cultural Centre Venue Partnership Scheme - "Neometropolis" Play Reading by Reframe Theatre
event.progtimec: 演出長約一小時十五分鐘，不設中場休息
event.progtimee: Approximately 1 hour 15 mintues with no intermission.
event.descc: 甄拔濤繼《後人類旅程》三部曲後全新系列創作德國吉森國家劇院Theater Gießen首演曾經有那麼一個世界，完全按照著植物的意思而組成……若干年後，城市隔絕了森林，森林只得逆襲城市樹根悄然爬入鋼筋的縫隙森林揚言：「這個星球發生過多次物種滅絕，而這次完全是人類自找的！」繼「後人類三部曲」，甄拔濤開展關注人與自然關係的全新系列劇作。首作《吃掉城市的森林》在2024年年初於德國吉森國家劇院Theater Gießen首演，12月將回到香港，為再構造劇場在東九文化中心首個節目，並以讀劇展演方式向觀眾率先介紹文本。演出邀得創作歌手Luna is a Bep參與歌曲創作及演出，以文字與音樂共同訴說一個預言故事。為了人類的福祉，智慧城市 Neometropolis 築起了一道屏障，阻隔城市與森林。城內的內哄聲音不斷，同時間森林被逼得無路可走，決定進行反擊，主宰城市命運的市長和科技巨頭忙得焦頭爛額。森林與城市之爭，如箭在弦，平息紛爭的關鍵竟落在一個丟失了愛貓的少年。據家中的植物所說，貓咪聽到森林的呼喚而離開。少年為尋找它，避開了城市的監視系統，隻身走入森林深處，展開一場橫越自然與科技間的旅程。演出全長約1小時15分，不設劃位粵語演出東九文化中心前往方法：九龍灣站B出口，經行人天橋步行約5分鐘《吃掉城市的森林（讀劇演出）》為東九文化中心「東九開箱」試場節目之一再構造劇場 為東九文化中心場地伙伴資助：香港藝術發展局香港藝術發展局支持藝術表達自由，本計劃內容並不反映本局意見。
event.desce: A world once existed that was organised precisely as plants wanted it.Years later, the city isolates the forest, leaving the forest with no choice but to retaliate against.The roots creep into the gaps of the steel and concrete.The Forest declared,"There are so many times of extinction of species on this Planet, and this time is entirely on Humans!"After the Posthuman Journey Trilogy, Yan Pat To has kicked off a new series of works focused on the relationship between humans and nature. The first piece, Neometropolis, debuted in early 2024 at the Theater Gießen in Germany. In December, it will return to Hong Kong as the first program of Reframe Theatre at the East Kowloon Cultural Centre, presenting a play reading to introduce the text to the audience in advance. The performance features a singer-songwriter, Luna is a Bep, who contributes to the songwriting and performance, telling a prophetic story through words and music.For the well-being of humanity, the smart city Neometropolis built a shield to separate the city from the forest. Inside the city, protests are uprising, while the forest decided to fight back the city. The mayor and the tech giant, who control the fate of the city, are overwhelmed and frantic with worries.The conflict between the city and the forest will be triggered at any moment. The key to resolve it rests on a boy who had lost his beloved cat. As the plants at his home said, the cat had been summoned by the forest and thus it wandered off. To find his cat back, the boy evaded the city surveillance system and ventured deep into the forest, embarking on a journey that traverse the realms of nature and technology.Approximately 1 hour 15 minutes, Free seatingPerformed in CantoneseHow to get to East Kowloon Cultural Centre:Approx. 5-minute walk from MTR Kowloon Bay Station Exit B via footbridge"Neometropolis (Play reading)" is one of the “Unbox EKCC” trial programmes of the East Kowloon Cultural CentreReframe Theatre is the venue partner of East Kowloon Cultural CentreSupported by Hong Kong Arts Development CouncilHong Kong Arts Development Council supports freedom of artistic expression. The views and opinions expressed in this project do not represent the stand of the Council.
event.remarkc: 《吃掉城市的森林（讀劇演出）》獲香港藝術發展局「藝術人才見習配對計劃」的資助香港藝術發展局支持藝術表達自由，本計劃內容並不反映本局意見。《吃掉城市的森林（讀劇演出）》為東九文化中心「東九開箱」試場節目之一再構造劇場 為東九文化中心場地伙伴
event.remarke: "Neometropolis" is financially supported by Hong Kong Arts Development Council “2024/25 Arts Talents Internship Matching Programme”Hong Kong Arts Development Council supports freedom of artistic expression. The views and opinions expressed in this project do not represent the stand of the Council."Neometropolis" is one of the “Unbox EKCC” programmes of the East Kowloon Cultural CentreReframe Theatre is the venue partner of East Kowloon Cultural Centre
event.presenterorgc: 再構造劇場主辦; 再構造劇場為東九文化中心場地伙伴
event.presenterorge: Presented by Reframe Theatre; Reframe Theatre is the venue partner of East Kowloon Cultural Centre.

event.titlec: 保誠保險呈獻：今天…is the Day 劉德華巡迴演唱會2024/2025 – 香港站
event.titlee: Prudential Presents: Today…is the Day Andy Lau Concert Tour 2024/2025 – Hong Kong
event.remarkc: 此節目不會於售票處及自助售票機售票，只設網上、流動應用程式及電話訂購。每張門票只限一人進場（包括嬰兒）。本節目每場備有36個輪椅座位，每個輪椅座位可附設1 個看顧人座位。
event.remarke: There will be no counter booking and self-service ticketing kiosk booking. Only internet, mobile app and credit card telephone bookings are available.Each ticket admits one person only (including infant). 36 wheelchair seats, each accompanied with one optional minder seat are available for each performance of the event.

event.titlec: 修復瑰寶——《流金歲月》珍藏劇照展
event.titlee: Restored Treasures – Last Romance Photo Exhibition
event.descc:
《流金歲月》（1988）距離首次面世已有36年，時至今日，電影經過4K數碼修復後，將為觀眾帶來全新的觀影體驗。出品公司花生映社慷慨提供了多年來鮮有曝光的劇照作展出，讓觀眾得以一睹電影拍攝時的風貌。這些珍貴的劇照，讓這部歷久彌新的電影，倍添餘韻悠悠。
伙伴機構︰花生映社有限公司
event.desce:
Thirty-six years have passed since the premiere of Last Romance (1988), and the recent 4K restoration is offering audiences a fresh viewing experience. Far-Sun Film Co Ltd, the film’s production company, has generously contributed film stills for this special exhibition. These rarely seen photos capture precious moments from the set, allowing the enduring charm of this timeless classic to resonate anew.
Partner Organisation: Far-Sun Film Co Ltd
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.remarke: Each ticket admits one person only (including infant). 36 wheelchair seats, each accompanied with one optional minder seat are available for each performance of the event.There will be no counter booking and self-service ticketing kiosk booking. event.titlec: 第53屆香港法國電影節 ─ 《四百擊》
event.titlee: The 53rd Hong Kong French Film Festival- "The 400 Blows"
event.descc: 住在巴黎的少年安坦被疏忽的父母忽視，因而經常逃學，偷入電影院，離家出走，偷東西，之後又嘗試（但失敗）歸還所偷的東西。正如大多數的孩子一樣，他是因為一些他認為是對的事而闖禍，而不是因為真的犯錯。而又與大多數孩子不一樣，闖禍後等待他的是棒棍侍候。他所認識的巴黎只有骯髒的公寓、破舊的商場、廢棄的工廠和沒有甚麼特別的街道，在孩子眼中，這是一座很大，充滿了可能性的城市。
event.desce: A young Parisian boy, Antoine Doinel, neglected by his derelict parents, skips school, sneaks into movies, runs away from home, steals things, and tries (disastrously) to return them. Like most kids, he gets into more trouble for things he thinks are right than for his actual trespasses. Unlike most kids, he gets whacked with the big stick. He inhabits a Paris of dingy flats, seedy arcades, abandoned factories, and workaday streets, a city that seems big and full of possibilities only to a child's eye.

event.titlec: 香港戲劇工程《故事探險隊尋寶時間》— 北區大會堂場地伙伴計劃
event.titlee: Theatre Treasure Hunt by Hong Kong TheatreWorks - North District Town Hall Venue Partnership Scheme
event.descc: 今次故事探險隊的隊員將會跟小朋友大朋友們： 一起講故事、玩遊戲、做手工 ！用生動活潑方式，採用繪本故事來引導帶領小朋友去發掘他們的共讀興趣，繼而在故事中領悟更多的道理。帶領大家一起進入故事世界尋找故事中的寶藏......這寶藏就是孩子成長的元素：德育、品格及教訓等。
event.remarkc: 香港戲劇工程為北區大會堂場地伙伴。
event.remarke: Hong Kong Theatre Works is the venue partner of the North District Town Hall.

event.titlec: 屯門大會堂場地伙伴計劃：春天實驗劇團-舞台劇《金鎖記》
event.titlee: Tuen Mun Town Hall Venue Partnership Scheme : "The Golden Cangue - Drama" by Spring-Time Experimental Theatre
event.pricec: $280, $220, $160 (全日制學生及綜援受惠人士優惠先到先得，額滿即止)
event.pricee: $280, $220, $160 (Consessionary discount for Full-time students and Comprehensive Social Security Assistance (CSSA) recipients on a first-come-first-served basis with limited quotas)
event.descc: 亂世時代，有多少人為了錢，白天謀殺自己的幸福，夜裡放縱自己的情慾？曹家為攀附權貴，把曹七巧（焦媛飾）嫁進豪門姜家，她丈夫是癱病在床的姜二爺，七巧卻鍾情於三爺季澤（李潤祺飾）。封建家族的桎梏、勾心鬥角的壓迫、斷送愛情的痛苦，七巧遭受生活上種種壓抑，人格扭曲瘋狂，抓緊金錢，賠上子女的幸福，以報復來補償那註定是悲劇的命運。絢爛又沉重的金鎖，鎖住一代又一代，掙脫不了……
event.remarkc: 春天實驗劇團及生輝粵劇研究中心為屯門大會堂場地伙伴
event.remarke: Spring-Time Experimental Theatre and Glory Chinese Opera Institute are the Venue Partners of the Tuen Mun Town Hall
